content: Operating income for the quarter was $14.4 million, 19.7% of revenue, an increase of 5% compared with $13.8 million, 20.4% of revenues in the second quarter of last year. EBITDA for the quarter was $19.4 million, 26.5% of revenue, an increase of 7% compared with an EBITDA of $18.2 million, 26.9% of revenues in the second quarter of last year. Net income for the second quarter of 2022 was $8.7 million, 11.9% of revenue, or earnings per share of $0.43 compared with net income of $9.1 million, 13.5% of revenues or earnings per share of $0.44.
